1.content: Select the series you want to work with, for starters.
1.title: Newspaper Comic AR/AP

11.content: How about the fat, lazy, lasagna-lovin' cat? Who from his world would get regressed?
11.title: Garfield

111.content: How does Garfield get older or youger?
111.title: How does Garfield get older or youger?

choices: younger (lets see how he likes being a kitten)
older (so he will be too weak)
1111.content: Nermal finally had enough of Garfield bullying him. He knew the perfect way to get revenge was to make Garfield...
1111.title: Nermal's revenge

11111.content:
Nermal decided that if Garfield took advantage of him being older then him. Nermal would make him younger.

Lets see how he likes being a kitten said Nermal

Luckily the how wouldn't be a problem. Nermal had met a black cat owned by a witch. Nermal told it of her problem. The cat explained her owner had created a youth potion. All Nermal had to do was pour it into his food and the next morning, Garfield would be younger.

So Nermal snuck the potion into Garfield's favorite food, Lasagna. Garfield of course gulped it down. The next morning Nermal went to see her revenge, went to Garfield's bed to find him....
11111.title: Nermal makes Garfield younger

113.content: Garfield and Odie's owner, huh? Well, how should his age change?
113.title: Jon

1133.content: So down to his early stages of life, then, huh? Which one?
1133.title: Younger (Baby/Newborn/Pre-Birth)

11331.content: So, how will this transformation occur? Will he wake up in that state or something else?
11331.title: Baby

115.content: Someone else, hmm? Who else could serve as a good target?
115.title: Someone Else

12.content: Calvin & Hobbes, huh? That was a great strip. Way too good to last. Okay, so pick out a character to be the focus of this little age experiment.
12.title: Calvin & Hobbes

122.content: Which one of Calvin's parents should be regressed? Or should they both be the victims?
122.title: Calvin's Parents

1223.content: Alright, so both of them, huh? Shall they both get younger or older?
1223.title: Both Of Them

12231.content: Alright, so how young should they get?
12231.title: Age Regression

122312.content: How about if they get regressed to six years, Calvin's age?
122312.title: Something Else

1223122.content: Maybe they'll both become babies. Will that work?
1223122.title: Something Else

choices: His parents were babies, but not much else different
His parents were babies, and their room became a nursery
12231221.content:
Calvin was always irritated by his parents and they always tended to be irritated by him as well. He didn't like his mom's disgusting meals, he didn't like his dad's methods of "building character", and he didn't like their overbearing rules. And yet, he didn't realize, or did, but thought nothing of it, that his parents were driven crazy by his own behavior. In fact, he was currently in bed early due to a stunt he pulled earlier which could easily be dubbed "the Next Noodle Incident". When Hobbes, his tiger friend, was in bed with him, he angrily stated that he wanted nothing to do with it. He was angry enough that he was being sent to bed early, during summer, of all times!

"My parents are probably some of the biggest jerks I have ever had to deal with," Calvin said.

"Well, they did give birth to you. Imagine just how cranky they would be if they had to deal a messy, noisy little creature for the first few years and then you get older and nothing changed," responded Hobbes.

"I guess tha- HEY!!!"

"Just had to state what was on my mind."

"Whatever. I'm convinced they were never kids. Just some aliens impersonating as humans. That'd be more interesting."

"How could you know that for sure?"

"I don't know."

"Well, maybe you shouldn't say things like that without thinking."

"I guess you're right..."

Eventually, they said goodnight to each other and went to sleep, while Calvin was thinking, "My parents need a good dose of what it's like being little. Maybe then, they'll learn something." Unbeknownst to him, though, that night, some incredible changes were taking place...

The next morning, Calvin had gotten up relatively early. Summer and Saturdays were when he usually got up on his own. On school days, he had to be waken up by his mom or even dragged out of bed by her. Something about the house seemed... odd. He got off the bed and walked towards his parents' room. When he opened the door, he was shocked to find that...
12231221.title: Infancy/ Babyhood

122312212.content:
Calvin was staring in awe at his parents' room. Or rather, what USED to be his parents' room. It was now a nursery. Calvin never remembered hearing ANYTHING about his mom expecting a baby, that was weird. Add to that the fact that this was now in his parents' room, and it became bizarre. Had this all occurred overnight? He remembered being in this room yesterday with no changes in it, but all that was past now.

As he looked around, he saw a changing table, a few step ladders, a chest of drawers, a small bookshelf filled with board books, and a toybox. And there, at the back of the room, stood a crib. A plain white crib with a mobile hanging over the top and a nightstand with a lamp by it. Calvin snuck up closer for a look, and saw, sleeping in the crib, two babies, one boy and one girl. They were both sleeping where Calvin could get a good look at both of them. He looked at the girl, who was sucking her thumb in her sleep, and then at the boy, who was just lying on his back, kicking the air once in a while. Both had a shirt, a diaper, and booties on. Calvin looked over by the crib at the nightstand and saw something he would not expect.

His dad's glasses.

Calvin had noticed that the babies did look like his parents, but that could have just been a staggering coincidence, however. But as he looked at the glasses, then over at the boy baby, who was now sleeping on his side, he decided to try something out. He climbed up a stepladder that was near the crib, and carefully slipped the glasses over the boy's eyes, and he could clearly see the resemblance the boy had to his dad now. He took off the glasses and went over to the girl baby. As he looked her over a little more, he could see a resemblance to his mom. Now this is getting weird, Calvin thought, could it be that my parents have become babies overnight?

Then, as he was thinking all this over...
122312212.title: A Nursery

13.content:
Ah yes Peanuts, one of most well known comics. Ran for 50 years, from 1950 to 2000, about the everyday life of charlie brown and the kids he lives near (you can't really call over 95% his friends.)
But which one is going to be regressed?
13.title: Peanuts

choices: Lucy decides to tell someone about this.
Lucy deal with the situation herself.
133221.content:
It was Saturday morning, Lucy awoken in her room. She got out of bed and head down the hall, passed her parents room which was empty as they were away this weekend.

She open the door. Linus was still sleeping it seems. Lucy thought about what a lazy blcokhead he was. She walked over to the bed, Linus was deep over the cover as she could see the lump. She pushed him and said

"Get up" she shouted. She was still asleep. She shock him again "I said get up!" still nothing. "I SAID GET UP BOCKHEAD!" She ripped the blanket off the bed. Lying in the bed was a small baby wrapped up in Linus's Security blanket. Then it hit who this baby is.
133221.title: He woke up like that

13412.content: Does she wake up as a baby, or does something else happen to her?

info.brief_description: Make characters from various comic strips and panels grow older or younger!
info.description:
We all know that newspaper comics have become rather outdated and most of the strips have gotten rather mediocre over the years, so hopefully there are those out there who still read them. I made this for those who read the comics and like age transformation as well.

The stories can involve a large variety of comics that could be used, like Garfield, Calvin & Hobbes, Peanuts, and many more series and they can go however you want, but they must have characters getting older or younger as a focus. I'm looking for anyone who knows about some of these characters so that they can contribute as well.

DA RULES:
Other transformations can be included, but age regression/progression is the main focus.
No killing off characters.
No sex or vore (Regressing to unbirth, though, is acceptable.)
Put effort in description, unless you're giving more options. Try to build a story around the effects.
Use your imagination! Some comics tend to be more based around real life than others, so let's ignore that aspect and go wild with what could cause the effects!
Keep to the rating, people!
If you want to poke fun at certain series, do so, but DON'T BE TOO HARSH.
